meaning_str.bing:
n. 夹克衫；短上衣；书套；（热水管的）保温套
v. 给…穿短上衣；给…盖上罩子[套子等]；给…包上护封；〈口〉打
网络. 外套；茄克衫；护套

夹克衫；短上衣；书套；（热水管的）保温套
给…穿短上衣；给…盖上罩子[套子等]；给…包上护封；〈口〉打

夹克衫；短上衣；外套；书籍封面；唱片套；书套；（书籍通常带有图案或画面的）护封；绝热罩；保护套；（热水管）保温套；隔离罩
给…穿上夹克（或短上衣）；给…加外衣；给…套上保护套；给…装上封套；给…包覆外层

1.en: Future aviators will love to be wrapped up in this jacket while they daydream of one day being a pilot in the sky.
1.cn: 未来的飞行员将爱情被包裹在这件夹克，而他们遐想有一天，天空中的一个试点。

2.en: And how much did you spend on your black leather jacket?
2.cn: 你买你的黑色皮衣花了多少钱？

3.en: Even though she was worn-out, it was the ball with the leather jacket.
3.cn: 尽管已经破旧不堪，那东西就是裹着皮外套的球。

0.en: Then why are you wearing Monica's jacket?
0.cn: 那你为什么穿着莫妮卡的夹克？

1.en: Do I miss the way he fixes the zipper on my jacket when it gets stuck? I don't think so.
1.cn: 还是我怀念他帮我修好夹克上卡住的拉链? 我可不这么想。

2.en: Excuse me. I apologize, but Becky said you needed something taken care of on your jacket. Oh, right.
2.cn: 抱歉，我道歉，但是贝琪说你有一些东西要注意，你的夹克衫。噢，是的。

3.en: If you had ripped jeans and a leather jacket, you'd be like the toughest kid on the Disney Channel.
3.cn: 如果你再穿上破烂的牛仔裤和皮夹克，你就可以当迪士尼儿童台中的校霸了。

4.en: I just hope that when Hal get shot it's through the front of his jacket. Like a simple entry wound not what you miss.
4.cn: 我只希望哈尔中枪时，是穿过夹克前面。像个简单射伤，不足为虑。

5.en: And then I think it was Yves Saint Laurent. Wasn't it? who showed cerulean military jackets? I think we need a jacket here.
5.cn: 然后，我估计是圣罗兰，是吗？设计出天蓝色的军式夹克衫。我认为还需要件外套，嗯。

6.en: The right sleeve of your jacket, plus the formaldehyde mixed with your cologne and your complete inability to stop looking at your watch.
6.cn: 你夹克的右袖子。而且你的古龙水混着福尔马林的味道，还有你完全无法忍住不看表。

7.en: The jacket. This droid says you stole it.
7.cn: 这件外套，机器人说是你偷来的。

8.en: Wait. Shh. They're in my jacket. Okay. Got it.
8.cn: 等等，在我的外套里。好吧，知道了。

9.en: Has he ever dressed like this? No. No. Jacket and tie.
9.cn: 他有穿戴成这样吗? 不，没有，都是西装领带。

10.en: Oh, yeah. No, you can't have my jacket. Because then I would be cold.
10.cn: 可以，不行，我的外套不能借你，因为那样我就会冷。

11.en: Yeah. I'm okay. I'm actually, I'm a little cold, can I have your jacket?
11.cn: 还好，其实我有点冷，外套可以借我吗？

12.en: I forgot my coat. Oh! Here's your coat, honey. That's such a cute jacket.
12.cn: 忘了拿外套。来，亲爱的，外套拿去，这外套太萌了。

13.en: You know how you throw your jacket on a chair at the end of the day? Yeah.
13.cn: 我们下班回家，会把外套扔到椅子上。是的。

14.en: Are you all right? I'm just a little hot. Do you mind if I take off my jacket?
14.cn: 你还好吗？我就是有点热，介意我把外套脱掉吗？

15.en: Hey, if you're still looking to make money, I will pay you to burn that jacket.
15.cn: 如果你还想着挣外快，我愿意付钱让你把外套烧了。

16.en: Just out. Had some lunch, just me, little quality time with me. Thanks for your jacket.
16.cn: 出去吃了午餐，只有我一个人，与自己共度美好时光，谢谢你的外套。

17.en: Hey, that's a sharp jacket you've got on today. Oh, thanks. Wait. What are you doing here?
17.cn: 嘿，你今天穿得够显眼的啊。哦，谢谢。什么？你来这儿干嘛？

18.en: But Daddy, you have the white shirt. Just take off your jacket. See? Fantastic! Thank you, Peppa.
18.cn: 但是爸爸，你有白色的衬衫啊。只要脱掉外套，看？太棒了！谢谢你，佩佩。

19.en: So, these will match the jacket you picked out for me last week? Um-hmm. There we go. There it is.
19.cn: 这跟你上星期挑的外套配？是的，这就对了，就是这样。
